articles.description: Manager Jurgen Klopp feels Chelsea are "definitely" favourites for Sunday's EFL Cup final but says a depleted Liverpool "will go for it" after they beat Luton to extend their Premier League lead.
articles.title: 'As long as we have 11 players, we will go for it' - Klopp

articles.description: Arsenal are stunned as Galeno scores in stoppage time to give Porto the advantage from the first leg of their Champions League last-16 tie.
articles.title: Galeno scores late winner as Porto stun Arsenal

articles.description: Two years on from Russia's invasion of Ukraine, Elina Svitolina represents her country on court and in the conflict.
articles.title: Elina Svitolina: The star and the kids who play on through horror

articles.description: Liverpool move four points clear at the top of the Premier League table after coming from behind to beat Luton at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool beat Luton to move four points clear at top

articles.description: New Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe says his "preference" is to build a new stadium that can also "serve the north of England".
articles.title: Man Utd's Ratcliffe wants 'national stadium in north'

articles.description: Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe speaks to BBC sports editor Dan Roan after buying a 27.7% stake in Manchester United.
articles.title: It's not a simple fix at Man Utd - Ratcliffe

articles.description: US Open champion Coco Gauff says a long disagreement with the umpire helped her beat Karolina Pliskova to reach the Dubai quarter-finals.
articles.title: Dubai Tennis Championships: Coco Gauff beats Karolina Pliskova, Iga Swiatek & Zheng Qinwen also win

articles.description: Victor Osimhen scores in his first Napoli match since December as Barcelona are held to a 1-1 draw in the first leg of their Champions League last-16 tie.
articles.title: Osimhen scores on return as Napoli hold Barcelona

articles.description: Spanish football writer Guillem Balague tells BBC Sport why Paris St-Germain striker Kylian Mbappe has agreed to join Real Madrid this summer.
articles.title: Why Mbappe is swapping Paris St-Germain for Real Madrid

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen makes an ominous start to Formula 1 pre-season testing with a lap time more than a second clear of the field.
articles.title: F1 pre-season testing: Max Verstappen more than a second clear on day one in Bahrain
